pages.text: The $(5)Block Alter Module$() is an optional module for the $(l:mffs:machines/interdiction_matrix)Interdiction Matrix$(). It enables a Matrix to inhibit a player's ability to place or break blocks. If a player tries to break or place a block that falls within the action area of the $(l:mffs:machines/interdiction_matrix)Interdiction Matrix$(), it will inform the player that they do not have permission to do this and then reverse whatever they may have done.
